skills.desc:
Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns equal to 25% of their MAX HP, then attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. 

If the target’s MAX HP is equal to or lower than this Champion’s, the [Provoke] debuff cannot be resisted.
